analyzed: bsam pa dang / sbyor ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi zad pa gsum ni bsdus pa'i don las de'i 'bras bu zhes smos pa yin te /

translated: That attitude of non-exhaustion is also taught by way of ten aspects of character:

translated: the character of purity, the character of engagement, the character of non-retrogression, the character of hope, the character of non-distortion, the character of non-forgetfulness, the character of cause, the character of object,

analyzed: g-yo med pas na byas pa ma yin no zhes bya bas gzhan du mi lta ba yin te /

analyzed: sgyu med pas rab tu rtogs pa'o zhes bya bas bdag dang gzhan gyi khyad mi sgrun pa bstan te /

original: gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du sems pa ni sgyu ste /
analyzed: gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du sems pa ni sgyu ste /

analyzed: dag pas na sgyu med pa'o zhes bya bas bag chags 'joms pa bstan te g-yo dang sgyu'i bag chags dag pas na sgyu dang bsam pa med do //

original: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa lnga ste byas nas 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang / ma byas kyang 'jug pa dang dus su 'jug pa dang mi skyo bar 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'jug pa'o //

translated: The characteristics of engagement are also fivefold: engagement that occurs after having done, engagement without having done, engagement at the right time, engagement without weariness, and complete engagement.

analyzed: de la drang bas na dag pa'o zhes bya bas byas nas 'byung zhing 'jug pa bstan te /

original: sems la g-yo sgyu med pa ni drang ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sems la g-yo sgyu med pa ni drang ba zhes bya ste /

original: de bas na dag pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na dag pa'o //

analyzed: gya gyu med pas na drang ba'o zhes bya bas ma @44b byas kyang 'jug pa bstan te /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa med pas na gsal ba'o zhes bya bas mi skyo bar 'jug pa bstan te /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa ni snga phyi mi mthun zhing 'gal ba la bya ste /

original: de med pa na gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de med pa na gsal ba'o //

analyzed: sra bas ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o zhes bya bas rab tu 'jug par bstan te /

original: sra ba ni brtan zhing snying por gyur pa la bya ste /
analyzed: sra ba ni brtan zhing snying por gyur pa la bya ste /

analyzed: mi mthun pa dang 'gal ba'i rkyen mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The four characteristics of nonretrogression are

analyzed: gnod pa byas kyang 'jug pa dang sbyor ba mi gtong ba dang zang zing gis mi 'khol ba dang / des bde ba nyid du ma gyur pa'o //

analyzed: de la mi phyed pas na sra ba'o zhes bya bas gnod pa byas kyang 'jug pa bstan te / phyed pa ni gzhan gyis gnod pa byas na /
translated: It is hard because it is not split. This shows that it is engaged even when harmed.ğŸ”½It is split when,

analyzed: zhe sdang gis phyir gnod par bya bar bsams pa ste /

analyzed: de med pas na sra ba'o //

analyzed: mkhrang bas na mi phyed pa'o //

analyzed: sems can gyi don bya ba las gzhan du mi 'gyur bas na mkhrang ba zhes bya ste /
translated: It is firm because it does not turn away from working for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de bas na mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not split.

analyzed: ji ltar khas blangs pa las 'gyur ba med pas ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya ste /

analyzed: de bas na mkhrang ba'o //

analyzed: mi gnas pa na mi g-yo ba'o zhes bya bas zang zing gis mi 'khol ba bstan te /

analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na nyon mongs pa'i phung po lnga la mi rten pas mi rtag par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang zang zing de dag la ma chags pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: re ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: re ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: The characteristics of hope are also fivefold:

original: de la bye brag tu @45a * //
analyzed: de la bye brag tu @45a * //

analyzed: 'phags pas na de la ma chags pa'o zhes bya bas khyad zhugs pa'i bde ba thob pa bstan te /
translated: The phrase the noble ones are not attached to that indicates the attainment of a distinctive bliss.

original: bye brag tu 'phags pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob pa la bya ste /
analyzed: bye brag tu 'phags pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob pa la bya ste /

analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi zang zing la ma chags pa'o ;

analyzed: / ma smad pas bye brag tu 'phags pa'o zhes bya bas kha na ma tho ba med pa bstan te /
translated: The phrase the noble ones are distinguished by being irreproachable indicates the absence of any fault.

original: kha na ma thob pa'i chos ni smad pa'o //
analyzed: kha na ma thob pa'i chos ni smad pa'o //
translated: A reproachable Dharma is a fault.

original: sdig pa kha na ma tho ba'i chos ma byas pas bye brag 'phags te /
analyzed: sdig pa kha na ma tho ba'i chos ma byas pas bye brag 'phags te /
translated: Because they do not perform any sinful, reproachable Dharma, the noble ones are distinguished by being irreproachable.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thob bo //
translated: They attain a supramundane bliss.

original: legs par byas pa'i las kyi phyir ma smad pa'o zhes bya bas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bsam pa mngon par 'du byed pa bstan te //
analyzed: legs par byas pa'i las kyi phyir ma smad pa'o zhes bya bas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bsam pa mngon par 'du byed pa bstan te //
translated: The phrase because of their wholesome actions, the noble ones are distinguished by being irreproachable indicates the volition that is proper mental attention.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge ba'i las ma byas pa'i phyir ma smad pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge ba'i las ma byas pa'i phyir ma smad pa'o //
translated: It is not reprehensible because one does not perform nonvirtuous actions by means of body, speech, or mind.

original: ma bshungs pas na legs par byas pa'i las so zhes pas rtag pa bstan te /
analyzed: ma bshungs pas na legs par byas pa'i las so zhes pas rtag pa bstan te /
translated: It is well done because it is not done in a fit of pique.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug pa'am /
translated: It is constant because it is applied to the path of cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: ched 'ga' dge ba spyod pa ched 'ga' mi dge ba spyod pa ni bshungs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: ched 'ga' dge ba spyod pa ched 'ga' mi dge ba spyod pa ni bshungs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Or, it is done in a fit of pique when one sometimes practices virtue and sometimes practices nonvirtue.

analyzed: de ltar bshungs pa'i las mi byed pas na legs par byed pa zhes bya'o // 'gyod pa med pa na ma bshungs pa'o zhes bya bas yang dag pa'i bden pa bstan te 'gyod pa de mi dge ba byas nas phyis sems la gdung ba skyes pa ste /
translated: Since one does not perform actions in a fit of pique, it is well done.ğŸ”½It is not done in a fit of pique because it is free of regret.

original: de lta bu med pas na ma bshungs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu med pas na ma bshungs pa ste /
translated: It is not done in a fit of pique because it is free of regret.

original: rtag tu dge ba la gnas zhes bya bar 'dod do //
